name: Whatt
description:
Whatt is a light-based platformer made in GameMaker Studio 2 as my entry in the Amaze Me Game Jam GMS2.

It is far from finished since I had the pleasure of entering this jam right before a really difficult time hit me. The game is playable for now and serves as a nice prototype, and I will definitely finish it soon. More info in the final level.

The controls are simple: arrow keys and you eyesight
